Localization.Name: Talon
Localization.Description: A Croshaw-based munitions manufacturer that focuses on missiles, bombs, and torpedoes. \n\nIf it exists, there’s a Talon that can blow it up.

English.Name: Talon
English.Description: A Croshaw-based munitions manufacturer that focuses on missiles, bombs, and torpedoes. \n\nIf it exists, there’s a Talon that can blow it up.

Localization.Name: Hellion VII Missile
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Talon
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 7

Carrying a sizable payload and an advanced heat-seeking sensor suite, the Hellion missile from Talon can be effective against aggressors of all sizes.
